review.title: “A good starting place for a career.”
review.pros: Pros – Team oriented environment great health benefits.
review.cons: Cons – There is no place to be promoted to. Environment is also very unprofessional.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Boys club mentality needs to be eliminated while also not burning out your employees.
review.recommended: – I'm not optimistic about the outlook for this company
